info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Broadwater and northeastern Gallatin Counties through 1000 PM MDT... At 859 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Three Forks, or 26 miles south of Townsend, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and hail up to pea size. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bozeman, Belgrade, Three Forks, Manhattan, Logan, Amsterdam, Four Corners, Trident, Church Hill and Missouri Headwaters State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
